sentences.sContent: I verified the source from which I had that information.
sentences.sCn: 我核实了我获知那条信息的来源。

sentences.sContent: His statement was verified by several witnesses.
sentences.sCn: 他的说法得到了几位证人的证实。

remMethod.val: veri(真实)+fy(使…)→使…以为是真的→证实， 证明

words.tran: 可证实的；能作证的；可检验的

trans.tranOther: to discover whether something is correct or true
